channel.title: Rs2 eoc
channel.description:
anyone from RSC playing it? i have been for the last few weeks, pretty fun, the EOC combat system much better than the crap runescape has had since the beginning of its time.
also html5 client & running it on mobile devices means we can properly play anywhere we are.

item.title: Rs2 eoc
item.dc:creator: @nacional nacional
item.description:
@nacional wrote:

I tried to play but I got fucking lost. Besides I only play on my 40 5 99 and I can’t
even use any of my weapons anymore… wtf

Read full topic

item.title: Rs2 eoc
item.dc:creator: @The_Enforcer The Enforcer
item.description:

[quote=“xEnt, post:10, topic:518603”][quote author=tigerclan link=topic=636869.msg4294198#msg4294198 date=1367915750]

anyone from RSC playing it? i have been for the last few weeks, pretty fun, the EOC combat system much better than the crap runescape has had since the beginning of its time.

also html5 client & running it on mobile devices means we can properly play anywhere we are.

it’s cool when you’re on a good system. but atm i have a GeForce 6150LE with only 2gb of ram so it’s slow as shit
[/quote]

i’m running a 3570k @ 5ghz with dual 6970s and i get < 10 fps on the HTML5 client. needs a LOT of work[/quote]

3570K 5GHz? How are you cooling that thing?

item.title: Rs2 eoc
item.dc:creator: @xEnt xEnt
item.description:
@xEnt wrote:

[quote=“Lothy, post:6, topic:518603”]I don’t like the game anymore, and it’s only getting worse. To cut a long story short, the amount of game time required to get to the competitive gameplay stage (which nowadays is flat 99s) is substantial. To make matters worse, the effectiveness of the highest level armour is so much so that someone 20 levels lower could probably dominate you if they had it and you didn’t. Except that armour is worth almost half a billion gold.

To put that into perspective, you’re probably looking at 1000 hours minimum to maximise combat stats, and then at least a few hundred hours to acquire the best armour. Investing this much time into a game isn’t usually possible for people our age. It certainly isn’t worthwhile, especially when the game is in the sunset stage.[/quote]

yee it would suck for poor people. but i roll with drygores, pernix & virtus, few masks etc. sucks to be them. i love downing lv 150 monsters in like 4 seconds

Read full topic

item.title: Rs2 eoc
item.dc:creator: @Rodgerwilco Rodgerwilco
item.description:
@Rodgerwilco wrote:

Great post Lothy, I felt moved.

Read full topic

item.title: Rs2 eoc
item.dc:creator: @lothy Lothy
item.description:
@lothy wrote:

I don’t like the game anymore, and it’s only getting worse. To cut a long story short, the amount of game time required to get to the competitive gameplay stage (which nowadays is flat 99s) is substantial. To make matters worse, the effectiveness of the highest level armour is so much so that someone 20 levels lower could probably dominate you if they had it and you didn’t. Except that armour is worth almost half a billion gold.

To put that into perspective, you’re probably looking at 1000 hours minimum to maximise combat stats, and then at least a few hundred hours to acquire the best armour. Investing this much time into a game isn’t usually possible for people our age. It certainly isn’t worthwhile, especially when the game is in the sunset stage.

Read full topic
